lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump scrambled to put his rival on the defensive, showing unusual restraint over her illness but denouncing her charge that many of his supporters were bigoted.

byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.print_headline: Trump Seizes Rival’s Absence to Press Case
headline.main: Donald Trump Seizes Hillary Clinton’s Absence to Press His Case

snippet: Mr. Trump scrambled to put his rival on the defensive, showing unusual restraint over her illness but denouncing her charge that many of his supporters were bigoted....
abstract: Donald Trump, who has been surprisingly quiet about Hillary Clinton's bout with pneumonia, exploits her absence from campaign trail by attacking her on critical comments she made about his supporters; urgency within his team to effectively use this relatively uninterrupted moment is palpable as election is only eight weeks away.
